Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Population Sciences (PSWG) Working Group. The 2022 PSWG Town Hall will feature roundtable discussions centered around the topic of The Future of Population Sciences  to inform the Working Group of what questions should be addressed over the following year. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
Location: Grand Ballroom C, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
SearchResultBody: TM06. Population Sciences Working Group (PSWG) Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
